svg.text: Standard Feature Workflow · each step separated by /clear

g.text: Reads issue → prepares source tree → no model invocations
Runs the "Fix Issues" phase from the plan file
Full test suite · lint · type-check · memory write · clean .local/ files

svg.text: Usable at any time, not part of the main workflow
ZebraCode v1.4 · Claude Code Workflow Framework
